page.title: 12ULLAPOOL HIGH SCHOOL.
page.content: Ullapool High School is an equal opportunities school of 6 year status with a Primary Department.It is a mixed,non-denominational school with an age range from 5 to 18+ years. In the Primary Department there are 4 distinct classes,P.1,2,3 and 7 and 2 composite classes, P.4/5 and P.5/6, each having its own teaching area. During the first 2 years of Secondary Education all pupils follow a 'Common Course',having access to all subjects without reference to the sex of the pupil. The principal aims are, to provide a balanced education relevant to the abilities,aptitudes and interests of all pupils,to promote a healthy outlook on life and to foster pupils' understanding of their responsibility to their peers,parents,school and the community as a whole.
